PcmtEmssnFctrSetItem.name: PcmtEmssnFctrSetItem
PcmtEmssnFctrSetItem.description: Represents the individual emissions factors for scope 3 procurement analysis. Here, the environmentally extended input-output (EEIO) model outputs are used as the emission factors in units of tCO₂e per million spent (currency not specified).

EconomicSector.description: The name of the economic sector.

EconomicSectorCategory.description: The category of the economic sector.

EconomicSectorCode.description: The code representing the economic sector. This value is unique within the dataset, such as a North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the emissions factor.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

PcmtEmssnFctrSetId.description: The master record associated with this procurement item record.

ReferenceDataLoadLogId.description: The reference data load log record that's associated with the emissions factor.

Region.description: The region associated with this emissions factor

ShouldLockDtastUpdtForRec.description: Indicates whether the emissions factor record can be locked from dataset updates.

TotScpe3EmssnPerMillionSpent.description: The total scope 3 emissions per million spent that’s adjusted according to the inflation rate.
